snippet: Prominent South Koreans started an effort on Thursday backing Japanese supporters of a constitutional provision that renounces war.
abstract: Group of prominent South Koreans have started signature writing campaign to help Japan win Nobel Peace Prize for constitutional provision that renounces war, hoping international recognition for Japan's pacifism will curb Prime Min Shinzo Abe's tilt toward nationalism.
lead_paragraph: Prominent South Koreans started an effort on Thursday backing Japanese supporters of a constitutional provision that renounces war.

headline.main: South Koreans Back Japan’s Peace Constitution as Nobel Prize-Worthy
headline.print_headline: South Koreans Back Japan’s Peace Constitution as Nobel Prize-Worthy
